pr_title: [hpprinter] Some small updates to the HP binding

timeline.message:
Some small updates to the HP binding

- some string comparisons where using ==
- there were some issues with the null annotations, things were passed a long as being null while that would be killing for the status
- improved formatting
- Made more fields immutable
- do not recreate the status message map on every request
- add braces for if statments
- Use parseInt to convert int instead of using both parsing and unboxing
- use diamond operators
- use method references where possible
- do not put the device OFFLINE while starting to connect

Signed-off-by: Martin van Wingerden <martin@martinvw.nl>

timeline.bodyText: No, I referred to this with that remark
timeline.author: martinvw

timeline.message:
HP printer updates

Added some properties such as serial number and firmware date/version
Removed some duplication
Support some additional statuses
Show more detailed OFFLINE status in UI

Signed-off-by: Martin van Wingerden <martin@martinvw.nl>

HP printer final spotless run

Signed-off-by: Martin van Wingerden <martin@martinvw.nl>

timeline.bodyText:
You can use CoreItemFactory.NUMBER to set the item type:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                            .create(new ChannelUID(thingUid, CGROUP_USAGE, CHANNEL_COLOR_MARKING), "Number")
          
          
            
                                            .create(new ChannelUID(thingUid, CGROUP_USAGE, CHANNEL_COLOR_MARKING), CoreItemFactory.NUMBER)
timeline.author: cweitkamp

timeline.bodyText: You already set the status to ONLINE some lines before.
timeline.author: cweitkamp

timeline.bodyText: To avoid duplicate code you can call the close() method here.
